definition[0]: (1946â€“) a US singer and film actress. She is known for singing in the group Sonny and Cher with her husband Sonny Bono in the 1960s. Their most popular song was I Got You Babe. She has made many successful records on her own, including Gypsies, Tramps & Theives,  If I Could Turn Back Time and Believe. Her films include Mask and Moonstruck, for which she won an Oscar.
